name: Spirit of Merkuro
description:
This game is currently at the alpha stage of development, the demo is work-in-progress and does not reflect the final quality of the game.

Inspired by the 1997 classic DemonStar, Spirit of Merkuro is a top-down vertical shoot'em up, where you play as Eleanor, a member of Merkuro Elite Space Force, to defend the homeworld from invasion.

ControlGamepad (Recommended)
KeyboardMoveLS (Left Stick)
Arrow Keys / WASD
Toggle Fire
RT (Right Trigger)
CtrlBombLB (Left Button)
SpaceSkillRB (Right Button)
AltSkill Direction
RS (Right Stick)
